dict.acceptation: 建议，意见，暗示；联想，启发；微量；

sent.orig: Another suggestion suggestion is more support for tabaco control program and tobacco-control programs.
sent.trans: 另一个建议就是进一步加强禁烟计划。

sent.orig: Finally, the Thesis submit the suggestion to company suggestion and to the investor to demonstration.
sent.trans: 最后，本文根据实证提出对公司建议及对投资者的建议。

sent.orig: Mr. Snagsby's suggestion is the practical suggestion after all, and the beadle must be called in.
sent.trans: 斯纳斯比先生的意见毕竟是对的，这会儿必须把地保找来。

sent.orig: Suggestion: Don't try to disgorge, but call for medical treatment immediately.
sent.trans: 建议：不要尝试呕吐，并请立即就医处理。

sent.orig: Thank you so much for your suggestion.
